method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the list of features, issue an HTTP GET command on the authorization roles feature list URI. Note that the list of valid features depends on which software offerings are currently activated.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: Menu Entry
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: feature_id
param.doc: The internal identifier used for this entry.

param.name: feature
param.doc: The localized human-readable name of this entry.

param.name: children
param.doc: Any children that belong in this category. If there are no children, this entry is a feature.
